name: Free Illustration - recreating famous painting
description:
It was just for fun at first when I was inspired by some artists recreating famous paintingsðŸ¤©. Can you guess which one was the first illustration I did ðŸ˜Š? Then my friend suggested me to do a set with this similar style. Hope this file could give you some inspirations. Hope you all enjoy them and have fun with it! This file is free to edit and use, you could use it in your next project, wallpaper, profile pictures, stickers, pins...go crazy and be creative!


  • Made with Figma
  • Vector designs
